evidence.claim: AxmedRx is compliant with HIPAA regulations, allowing secure health information exchange.
AxmedRx supports HL7 standards for clinical data integration.
The platform employs FHIR APIs for health data interoperability.
X12 transaction sets are utilized for processing health-related EDI transactions.

icp.icp_reason: AxmedRx engages in health data exchange using EDI/X12 formats.
